tweets.text: Tropical Storm Milton has formed in the Gulf of Mexico. It's expected to strengthen and hit Florida next week.

Hezbollah has lost contact with a possible successor to assassinated leader Hassan Nasrallah. Hashem Safieddine was targeted in an Israeli airstrike.

Follow live updates.
Israel has given no assurances it won't target Iran's nuclear facilities, a top State Department official tells CNN
Factory workers in Tennessee were carried away by floodwaters. Their families say they weren't allowed to leave work in time to flee.

The US economy added a whopping 254,000 jobs last month, providing further reassurance of ongoing stability for the labor market.

Negotiators reach a tentative deal on wages in the port strike, with union members returning to work Friday, sources say
Country star Garth Brooks has been accused of sexual assault and battery in a lawsuit from a hair and makeup artist. He previously denied the claims.
An anonymous celebrity is asking a court to stop a sexual assault accuser from going public with her allegations before she files a lawsuit naming him
Death toll from Hurricane Helene soars to 200 after officials in Georgia and Florida report additional deaths
Melania Trump confirms her support for abortion rights and a woman's "individual freedom," a stance that puts her at odds with her husband

A court has ruled that a couple that was in a severe crash during an Uber ride can’t sue the company because they and their daughter agreed to arbitration when they accepted the terms of service for a separate Uber Eats order
The CDC forecasts this respiratory disease season could be worse than pre-pandemic years but vaccination rates may lower the burden of infections
Mark Chavez, one of the two doctors charged in connection with “Friends” star Matthew Perry’s death, has pleaded guilty to one count of conspiracy to distribute ketamine as part of a plea agreement
A new filing provides the fullest picture yet of the 2020 election case, outlining what special counsel Jack Smith describes as Donald Trump's "private criminal conduct"
Bank of America customers reported a widespread outage, with many people unable to access their accounts and others seeing zero balances

Biden says he does not support a retaliatory strike by Israel on Iranian nuclear sites following Tehran's missile attack.

Michelle and I are thinking of everyone impacted by Hurricane Helene, and are grateful to the first responders and volunteers doing everything they can to help. Here are some ways to support folks in need: http:// obama.org/stories/take-a ction-hurricane-helene …
"No one is born hating another person because of the color of his skin or his background or his religion..."

Kobe was a legend on the court and just getting started in what would have been just as meaningful a second act. To lose Gianna is even more heartbreaking to us as parents. Michelle and I send love and prayers to Vanessa and the entire Bryant family on an unthinkable day.
Congratulations to my friend, President @JoeBiden ! This is your time.
In every scene, you are my star, @MichelleObama ! Happy birthday, baby!
Happy birthday to my love, my partner, and my best friend. Every moment with you is a blessing. Love you, Miche.
John McCain is an American hero & one of the bravest fighters I've ever known. Cancer doesn't know what it's up against. Give it hell, John.

Like the Beatles said: It’s getting better all the time. Thanks, babe, for 27 amazing years!

Hi everybody! Back to the original handle. Is this thing still on? Michelle and I are off on a quick vacation, then we’ll get back to work.
Michelle & I are praying for the victims in Las Vegas. Our thoughts are with their families & everyone enduring another senseless tragedy.

Young people have helped lead all our great movements. How inspiring to see it again in so many smart, fearless students standing up for their right to be safe; marching and organizing to remake the world as it should be. We've been waiting for you. And we've got your backs.
Congratulations to my friends, @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris — our next President and Vice President of the United States.
Michelle and I are thinking of the victims and their families in Barcelona. Americans will always stand with our Spanish friends. Un abrazo.
"People must learn to hate, and if they can learn to hate, they can be taught to love..."
Michelle and I are so inspired by all the young people who made today’s marches happen. Keep at it. You’re leading us forward. Nothing can stand in the way of millions of voices calling for change.
Happy Valentine’s Day, @MichelleObama . You make every day and every place better.
Happy anniversary, sweetheart! @MichelleObama , you're brilliant, kind, funny, and beautiful—and I'm lucky to call you mine.
Thinking about our neighbors in Mexico and all our Mexican-American friends tonight. Cuidense mucho y un fuerte abrazo para todos.
